subject: Mixed Martial Arts
lead_paragraph: The Russian heavyweight Fedor Emelianenko stopped the former U.F.C. champion Andrei Arlovski with a right to the chin in the first round of the Affliction M-1 Global: Day of Reckoning event Saturday in Anaheim, Calif.
snippet: The Russian heavyweight Fedor Emelianenko stopped the former U.F.C. champion Andrei Arlovski with a right to the chin in the first round of the Affliction M-1 Global: Day of Reckoning event Saturday in Anaheim, Calif.
